column5: I came across this rod storage system in a fishing magazine recently.  Anyone have any experience with it good or bad ?  http://www.ezrodorganizer.com/  Thanks for sharing your experiences / thoughts.  Rob v
Your rods will gather more dust laid out horizontally.

When I first saw that holder, I thought it was a good idea. So I decided to make the same thing. I put it over the garage like in the picture, well I don't want to use a ladder everytime I need a rod. Now I use the greay home depot hooks, screwed into the joists in the basement ceiling. Nice and neat, easy to get to.  The rod holder in the link has to be mounted high up or else you get poked in the eye if they are low.  I will post some pics of my setups, by the way those berkley locking holder are really good.  Here are the pics of my 3 setups, works for me. But just an idea
There Home Depot hooks, and the bonus is they are regular 76cents each.

The best ideas are almost always simple. My wife is so excited about the hook idea that she is ready to go out and buy them for me.... Did I mention that I'm sitting in our living room, surrounded by my tackle as I try to prepare for Lakair.... I think she figures to put me on one of those hooks.
The hook thing, saves me alot of floor space and I know I won't step on a rod. This rod storage system post inspired me to make a "How to: Oraganize you tackle and equipment"    LOL
Daniel M. - I like your ideas even better.  Thanks a lot for sharing.  I know where my rods will be "hanging" out this winter.  Thanks again.
This is what I LOVE about OFC, we all learn something off eachother. OFC rules.
